permissions: User must be an admin or an admin member of the broker organization to create a broker equipment classification.
side_effects: Creates a broker equipment classification linking a broker to an equipment classification.
validation_notes: --broker and --equipment-classification are required and cannot be empty. Equipment classification must not be a root classification (must have a parent). Each broker can only have one entry for a given equipment classification.

flags.name: --equipment-classification
flags.validation: non-empty; must not be a root classification
